task.title: Troubleshoot Weak or No Sound Coming from the Circuit
task.shortdesc: Systematically identify and fix the cause of weak or no sound by checking each potential wiring problem in order.

step.cmd: Test for faulty humbucker or output jack.
Check for shorts between hot and ground.
Verify the pickup is properly grounded and connected.

result.p: You have identified and resolved the cause of weak or no sound.
